## FlyoutItem class

Representation of an item displayed in a flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutItem 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getElement()](./blockly.flyoutitem.getelement.md) |  | Returns the element displayed in the flyout. |
|  [getType()](./blockly.flyoutitem.gettype.md) |  | Returns the type of flyout element this item represents. |
